name: Death from Above (itch) (TrenchcoatPhoenix)
description:
Death from Above

A simple artillery game with local multiplayer for Ludum Dare 42: Running out of space.

Both player take turn to either move their soldiers or fire their mortars. Any tile where a shell has already exploded can no longer be stepped upon. A player wins once they blow up the enemy.

Controls:
  • Move the cursor with the arrow keys
  • When the cursor is next to your player, press space to move there
  • Position the cursor over the enemy's side of the board and press space to fire
